sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A regular hexagon has a side length of 5 cm. Find its perimeter.
message_2:
A regular hexagon has six equal sides. Since the side length is 5 cm, the perimeter of the hexagon is 6 times the side length.

Perimeter = 6 Ã— 5 cm = 30 cm
